title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Speed to Impact: AI Factory in the Cloud with NVIDIA on AWS (AIM116)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速实现影响力：基于AWS的NVIDIA云端AI工厂 (AIM116)
abstract: Developing and deploying mission-critical AI systems is increasingly complex and resource-intensive. This panel discussion demonstrates how organizations can accelerate AI development with turnkey, full-stack AI factories in the cloud—combining NVIDIA’s optimized hardware, software, and AI expertise with AWS’ scalable, co-engineered infrastructure. Attendees will hear customer success stories illustrating how this collaboration enables rapid, efficient delivery of advanced generative and Agentic AI applications by optimizing every infrastructure layer and leveraging best-in-class tools from both NVIDIA and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 开发和部署关键任务AI系统日益复杂且资源密集。本小组讨论展示了组织如何通过云端交钥匙式全栈AI工厂加速AI开发——结合NVIDIA优化的硬件、软件和AI专业知识与AWS可扩展的协同工程基础设施。与会者将听到客户成功案例，说明这种合作如何通过优化每个基础设施层并利用NVIDIA和AWS的一流工具，实现先进生成式AI和智能体AI应用的快速高效交付。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。
